Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Defect found during scheduled
maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 17/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
